DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilização por Cargo(s)
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Horas consumidas","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":36,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contratadas","metricFieldValue":"TotalContractedTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Planejadas","metricFieldValue":"TotalPlannedTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Consumidas","metricFieldValue":"TotalActualTime"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  TypologyGroup,
        ContractedTime,
        PlannedTime,
        ActualTime,
        sum(ContractedTime) over() as TotalContractedTime,
        sum(PlannedTime) over() as TotalPlannedTime,
        sum(ActualTime) over() as TotalActualTime
from    (
        select  TypologyGroup,
                sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
                sum(PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
                sum(ActualTime) as ActualTime
        from    (
                        select  utg.Name as TypologyGroup,
                                edt.Hours * eit.Retainer as ContractedTime,
                                0 as PlannedTime,
                                0 as ActualTime
                        from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, Contract cnt, EstimateItemDetail edt, UserTypologyGroup utg
                        where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                                eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                                edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                                utg.Oid = edt.UserTypologyGroup and
                                edt.Type = 2
                                /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                        union all
						SELECT
							ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name]) as [TypologyGroup],
                            0 as ContractedTime,
                            SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedTime,
							0 as ActualTime
						FROM   
							dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] u ON (u.Oid = pht.[User])
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypology] ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utg ON (utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup)
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utgp ON (utgp.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup),
							dbo.Project p
						WHERE
							pht.GCRecord is null
							AND p.Oid = pht.Project
							/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
						GROUP BY 
							ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name])
                        union all
                        select  utg.Name as TypologyGroup,
                                0 as ContractedTime,
                                0 as PlannedTime,
                                DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0 as ActualTime
                        from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt, [User] usr, UserTypology ust, UserTypologyGroup utg
                        where   tim.Project = prj.Oid and 
                                prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                                usr.Oid = tim.CreatedBy and
                                ust.Oid = usr.Typology and
                                utg.Oid = ust.UserTypologyGroup
                                /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                ) t
        group by TypologyGroup
        ) t
"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Contribuição por Cargo(s)
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Utilização","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":23,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Consumido","metricFieldValue":"BillableHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Planejado","metricFieldValue":"PlannedHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contratado","metricFieldValue":"ContractedHoursGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"WITH ContractEstimateRates As
(
	select 
		eid.Department, eid.UserTypologyGroup, eid.[User], Max(eid.UnitPriceIncome) as UnitPriceIncome
	from
		dbo.Estimate e
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItem ei on (ei.Estimate = e.Oid)
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid on (eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2)
	where 
		e.GCRecord is null 
		and (e.[Contract] = @ContractId)
		and cast(getdate() as Date) between e.[Date] and e.Expiration
	group by 
		eid.Department, 
		eid.UserTypologyGroup, 
		eid.[User]
)
SELECT
    v.[TypologyGroup],
	sum(v.[ActualHours]) as [ActualHours],
    sum(v.[BillableHours]) as BillableHours,
    sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
	sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
	sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
	IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0.0) as ActualContractedPercentage,
	IIF(sum(v.PlannedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.PlannedHours), 0.0) as ActualPlannedPercentage,
	sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[PlannedHours])) OVER () as PlannedHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal
FROM  
(
	SELECT
		utg.[Name] as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.retainer) as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.Estimate e,
		dbo.EstimateItem ei,
		dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid,
		dbo.UserTypologyGroup utg
	WHERE
		e.[Contract] = @ContractId
		AND ei.Estimate = e.Oid
		AND eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2
		AND utg.Oid = eid.UserTypologyGroup
	GROUP BY 
		utg.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		t.[TypologyGroup],
		sum(t.[Hours]) as [ActualHours],
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours))) as BillableHours,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours)) * ISNULL(eidu.UnitPriceIncome, ISNULL(eidt.UnitPriceIncome, 0))) as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidu on (eidu.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidu.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidu.[User] = t.UserId)
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidt on (eidt.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidt.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidt.[User] is null)
	WHERE
		t.[TypologyGroup] IS NOT NULL
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and t.ProjectContractId = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		t.[TypologyGroup]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name]) as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] u ON (u.Oid = pht.[User])
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypology] ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utg ON (utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utgp ON (utgp.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup),
		dbo.Project p
	WHERE
		pht.GCRecord is null
		AND p.Oid = pht.Project
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name])
) v
GROUP BY
	v.TypologyGroup"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Distribuição Mensal
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Horas Planejadas, Utilização & Valor","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":23,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Consumido","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Planejado","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contratado","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with met as
(
    select  est.Oid as EstimateOid,
            datefromparts(Year(yrd.Day), Month(yrd.Day), 1) as [Date],
            count(*) over (partition by est.Oid) as Months
    from    Contract cnt, Estimate est, YearDay yrd
    where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
            yrd.Day between cast(est.Date as date) and cast(est.Expiration as date) and
            Day(yrd.Day) = Day(est.Date)
            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
),
mpj as
(
    select  prj.Oid as ProjectOid,
            datefromparts(Year(yrd.Day), Month(yrd.Day), 1) as [Date],
            count(*) over (partition by prj.Oid) as Months
    from    Contract cnt, Project prj, YearDay yrd
    where   prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
            yrd.Day between cast(prj.BeginDate as date) and cast(prj.EndDate as date) and
            Day(yrd.Day) = Day(prj.BeginDate)
            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
)
select  [Date], 
        sum(ResourcesWithVatIncome) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
        sum(ResourcesWithVatCost) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
        sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
        sum(PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
        sum(ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
        sum(ActualTime) as ActualTime,
        sum(sum(ContractedTime)) over() as ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
        sum(sum(PlannedTime)) over() as PlannedTimeGrandTotal,
        sum(sum(ForecastTime)) over() as ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
        sum(sum(ActualTime)) over() as ActualTimeGrandTotal
from    (
            select  [Date],
                    sum(ResourcesWithVatIncome) / max(Months) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                    sum(ResourcesWithVatCost) / max(Months) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                    sum(ContractedTime) / max(Months) as ContractedTime,
                    0 as PlannedTime,
                    0 as ForecastTime,
                    0 as ActualTime
            from    (
                    select  est.Oid as EstimateOid,
                            sum(edt.ValueWithVatIncome * eit.Retainer) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                            sum(edt.ValueWithVatCost * eit.Retainer) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                            sum(edt.Hours * eit.Retainer) as ContractedTime
                    from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, EstimateItemDetail edt, Contract cnt
                    where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                            eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                            edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                            edt.Type = 2
                            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                    group by est.Oid
                    ) t, met
            where   met.EstimateOid = t.EstimateOid
            group by t.EstimateOid, [Date]  
            union all
            select  [Date],
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                    0 as ContractedTime,
                    sum(PlannedTime) / max(Months) as PlannedTime,
                    0 as ForecastTime,
                    0 as ActualTime
            from    (
                    select  prj.Oid as ProjectOid,
                            sum(pht.PlannedMinutes / 60.0) as PlannedTime
                    from    PlannedHoursTotal pht, Project prj, Contract cnt
                    where   prj.Oid = pht.Project and
                            prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                            pht.GCRecord is null 
                            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                    group by prj.Oid
                    ) t, mpj
            where   mpj.ProjectOid = t.ProjectOid
            group by t.ProjectOid, [Date]  
            union all
            select  datefromparts(Year(pha.Date), Month(pha.Date), 1) as [Date],
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                    0 as ContractedTime,
                    0 as PlannedTime,
                    sum(pha.AdjustmentMinutes / 60.0) as ForecastTime,
                    0 as ActualTime
            from    PlannedHoursAdjustment pha, Project prj, Contract cnt
            where   prj.Oid = pha.Project and
                    prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                    pha.GCRecord is null 
                    /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
            group by Year(pha.Date), Month(pha.Date)
            union all
            select  datefromparts(Year(tim.[Date]), Month(tim.[Date]), 1) as [Date],
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                    0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                    0 as ContractedTime,
                    0 as PlannedTime,
                    0 as ForecastTime,
                    sum(DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0) as ActualTime
            from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt
            where   prj.Oid = tim.Project and
                    prj.Contract = cnt.Oid
                    /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
            group by Year(tim.[Date]), Month(tim.[Date])
        ) t
group by [Date]
"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilização por Usuário
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Horas consumidas","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":36,"WidgetRows":13,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Horas Faturáveis","metricFieldValue":"TotalBillableTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Horas não Faturáveis","metricFieldValue":"TotalNonBillableTime"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  [User],
        ContractedTime,
        BillableTime,
        NonBillableTime,
        sum(BillableTime) over() as TotalBillableTime,
        sum(NonBillableTime) over() as TotalNonBillableTime
from    (
        select  [User],
                sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
                sum(BillableTime) as BillableTime,
                sum(NonBillableTime) as NonBillableTime
        from    (
                select  usr.Name as [User],
                        edt.Hours as ContractedTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NonBillableTime
                from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, Contract cnt,
                        EstimateItemDetail edt left outer join [User] usr on usr.Oid = edt.[User]
                where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                        eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                        edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                        edt.Type = 2
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                union all
                select  usr.Name as [User],
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        iif(tim.Billable = 1 or tim.Billable is null, DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0, 0) as Billabletime,
                        iif(tim.Billable = 1 or tim.Billable is null, 0, DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0) as NonBillabletime
                from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt, [User] usr
                where   tim.Project = prj.Oid and 
                        prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                        usr.Oid = tim.CreatedBy
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and cnt.Oid = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                ) t
        group by [User]
        ) t"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Resumo
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[
    {
        "WidgetSubTitle": "Horas por Departamento e por Cargo",
        "WidgetType": "grid",
        "WidgetFilterField": "",
        "WidgetColor": "",
        "WidgetFrameStyle": {},
        "WidgetXPosition": 0,
        "WidgetYPosition": 0,
        "WidgetRows": 23,
        "WidgetColumns": 48,
        "WidgetHeader": {
            "showContextInfo": false,
            "WidgetPeriodChooser": {
                "type": "year",
                "visible": false
            },
            "WidgetMetrics": {
                "visible": true,
                "Metrics": [
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Consumido",
                        "metricFieldValue": "BillableHoursGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Planejado",
                        "metricFieldValue": "PlannedHoursGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Contratado",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ContractedHoursGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "R$ Consumidos",
                        "metricFieldValue": "BillableHoursIncomeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "R$ Planejados",
                        "metricFieldValue": "PlannedHoursIncomeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "R$ Contratados",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ContractedHoursIncomeGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "% R$ Contratado",
                        "metricFieldValue": "BillableContractedIncomePercentageGrandTotal"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Contrato",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ContractName"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Tipo",
                        "metricFieldValue": "ContractType"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Responsável",
                        "metricFieldValue": "UserName"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Início Contrato",
                        "metricFieldValue": "StartDate"
                    },
                    {
                        "visible": true,
                        "metricName": "Fim Contrato",
                        "metricFieldValue": "EndDate"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "showSubTitle": true,
            "showTitle": true
        },
        "WidgetDataSources": {
            "main": {
                "type": "querytext",
                "value": "with ContractEstimateRates As
(
	select	eid.Department, 
			eid.UserTypologyGroup, 
			eid.[User],
			Max(eid.UnitPriceIncome) as UnitPriceIncome
	from	Estimate e,
			EstimateItem ei,
			EstimateItemDetail eid
	where	ei.Estimate = e.Oid and
			eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid and 
			eid.[Type] = 2 and
			e.GCRecord is null and
			e.[Contract] = @ContractId
	group by eid.Department, eid.UserTypologyGroup, eid.[User]
)
SELECT
	c.[Name] as ContractName, 
	jt.[Name] as ContractType,
    convert(varchar, c.StartDate, 106) as StartDate,
    convert(varchar, c.EndDate, 106) as EndDate,    
	v.[Department],								
    v.[TypologyGroup],
	ssu.[UserName] as UserName,
	sum(v.[ActualHours]) as [ActualHours],
    sum(v.ActualHoursCost) as ActualHoursCost,
	sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) as ActualHoursIncome,
    sum(v.[BillableHours]) as BillableHours,
    sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
	sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
	sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) as ContractedHoursIncome,
	sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
	sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome) as PlannedHoursIncome,
	(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) - sum(v.ActualHoursCost)) as ContractedActualIncomeVariation,
	IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0.0) as ActualContractedPercentage,
	IIF(sum(v.PlannedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.PlannedHours), 0.0) as ActualPlannedPercentage,
	sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[PlannedHours])) OVER () as PlannedHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal,
	sum(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome)) OVER () as ContractedHoursIncomeGrandTotal,
	sum(sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome)) OVER () as PlannedHoursIncomeGrandTotal,
	sum(sum(v.BillableHoursIncome)) OVER () as BillableHoursIncomeGrandTotal,
	IIF(sum(sum(v.[ContractedHoursIncome])) OVER () > 0, sum(sum(v.[BillableHoursIncome])) OVER () / sum(sum(v.[ContractedHoursIncome])) OVER (), 0.0) * 100 as BillableContractedIncomePercentageGrandTotal
FROM  
(
	SELECT
		dp.[Name] as [Department],								
		utg.[Name] as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as ActualHoursCost,
		0 as ActualHoursIncome,
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.Retainer) as ContractedHours,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.Retainer * ISNULL(eid.UnitPriceIncome, 0)) as ContractedHoursIncome,
		0 as PlannedHours,
		0 as PlannedHoursIncome
	FROM   
		Estimate e,
		EstimateItem ei,
		EstimateItemDetail eid,
		Department dp,
		UserTypologyGroup utg,
		WorkflowState ws,
		WorkflowStateType wst
	WHERE
		e.GCRecord is null and
		e.[Contract] = @ContractId and
		ws.Oid = e.WorkflowState and
		wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
		wst.Status = 10 and
		ei.Estimate = e.Oid and
		eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid and
		eid.[Type] = 2 and
		dp.Oid = eid.Department and
		utg.Oid = eid.UserTypologyGroup
	GROUP BY 
		dp.[Name],
		utg.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		t.[Department],								
		t.[TypologyGroup],
		sum(t.[Hours]) as [ActualHours],
		sum(ISNULL(t.TotalUserCost, 0)) as ActualHoursCost,
		sum(t.[Hours] * ISNULL(t.UnitPriceIncome, 0)) as ActualHoursIncome,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours))) as BillableHours,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours)) * ISNULL(t.UnitPriceIncome, 0)) as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as ContractedHoursIncome,
		0 as PlannedHours,
		0 as PlannedHoursIncome
		from (
				select 
					t.UserDepartmentId as DepartmentId,
					t.Department,
					utg.Oid as TypologyGroupId,
					p.[Contract] as ProjectContractId,
					utg.[Name] as TypologyGroup,
					ISNULL(eidu.UnitPriceIncome, ISNULL(eidt.UnitPriceIncome, 0)) as UnitPriceIncome,
					iif(t.IsAdministrative = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0) as AdministrativeHours,
					IIF(
						(
							case 
								when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
								(
									isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0 and 
									isnull(pc.Billable, 0) = 0
								)
								then 1 
								else 0 
							end
						) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
					) as NewBusinessHours,
					IIF(
					(
						case 
							when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
							(
								(pc.Billable = 1 and isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0)
							) 
							then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
							else 0 
						end
						) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
					) as InternalWorkHours,
					IIF(
					(
						case
							when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
							(
								(pc.Billable = 1 or jc.Billable = 1)
							)
							then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
							else 0 
						end
						) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
					) as BillableHours,
					(t.[Hours] / 60.0) as [Hours],
					t.TotalUserCost
				from	dbo.SkillTimesheetExpanded t
						inner join Project p ON (p.Oid = t.ProjectId AND p.[Contract] = @ContractId)
						left outer join ProjectClassification pc on (pc.Oid = p.Classification)
						left outer join Deliverable d on (d.Oid = t.DeliverableId)
						left outer join JobClassification jc on (jc.Oid = d.Classification)
						left outer join UserTypology tp on (tp.Oid = t.UserTypologyId)
						left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on (utg.Oid = tp.UserTypologyGroup)
						left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidu on (eidu.Department = t.UserDepartmentId AND eidu.UserTypologyGroup = utg.Oid AND eidu.[User] = t.CreatedBy)
						left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidt on (eidt.Department = t.UserDepartmentId AND eidt.UserTypologyGroup = utg.Oid AND eidt.[User] is null)
	) t
	group by
			t.[Department],								
			t.[TypologyGroup]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		dep.Name as [Department],								
		utg.[Name] as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as ActualHoursCost,
		0 as ActualHoursIncome,
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as ContractedHoursIncome,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedHours,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0) * pht.SellRate) as PlannedHoursIncome
	FROM   
		PlannedHoursTotal pht,
		UserTypologyGroup utg,
		Department dep,
		(
			SELECT 
				utgdp.UserTypologyGroup,
				Max(utgdp.Department) as Department 
			FROM 
				[UserTypologyGroupDepartment] utgdp 
			GROUP BY
				utgdp.UserTypologyGroup
		) utgpdp,
		Project p
	WHERE
		pht.GCRecord is null and
		utg.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup and
		utgpdp.UserTypologyGroup = utg.Oid and
		dep.Oid = utgpdp.Department and
		p.Oid = pht.Project and
		p.[Contract] = @ContractId 
	GROUP BY dep.Name, utg.Name
) v, [Contract] c
		left outer join SecuritySystemUser ssu on ssu.Oid = c.[Owner]
		left outer join JobType jt on jt.Oid = c.JobType
where   c.Oid = @ContractId
group by v.Department, v.TypologyGroup, c.[Name], c.StartDate, c.EndDate, ssu.[UserName], jt.[Name]
"
            }
        },
        "Filters": {},
        "QueryConfiguration": {}
    }
]
